replies.body: "Am I cool" Read that 1000 times for me and actually think what you just said. You could have easily asked that on a recent AMA or on skype? It's not hard bud! The question is ridiculous itself and has no purpose. Why would you even bump a 1-year-old thread and write 3 words. This needs a lock because you can use something in between the left side and right side of your head. It's called a brain

replies.body:
LOL is an ama not self centred? Your asking everyone to ask you questions so you can answer. Seems pretty self centred to me.

I CALL TO STOP AMA'S THEY BREAK FORUM RULES!1!

xd now back to being mature.
He asked "is he cool" from what I heard. It's a question that he is asking people to answer on his ama. 
It makes it less self centred having people answer one of his questions on his own ama where people are meant to ask him questions xddd.
So lets not put that it was self centred in the point please :P
